event_specific.value: Tune is not a criterion for judgement.
Portion verses (Please refer the booklet for details).

generic.value: Please report misspelt names at the registration counter.
Parents will be allowed to watch the event.

event_specific.value: No hiring of costumes and playing recorded messages.
Duration of delivery of message - 2 mins.
Theme (Please refer the booklet for details).

event_specific.value: Please go through meanings of verses (40 to 55 for Stds 1 & 2, 40 to 60 for Stds 3 & 4) of Chapter 18.
A theme will be given based on the verses to draw.
Bring your own colouring medium (pencil/color-pencil/wax crayons/water colour), pad/board.

generic.value: Please report misspelt names at the registration counter.
All vehicles to be parked outside the complex.

event_specific.value: Please go through meaning of verses (40 to 65 for Std 5 & 6, 40 to 70 for Std 7 & 8 ) of chapter 18.
Participants will be given a theme based on the above verses.
Bring your own colouring medium, pad/board, materials like appropriate paper cuttings, designs, etc.
